text.headline: Celgene
text.text: Despite campaigning on the pledge of “taking on big businesses,” Trump own shares in big pharma companies including Pfizer, Merck, Celgene and GlaxoSmithKline; retailer Walmart, and consumer goods firms Procter & Gamble and Johnson & Johnson. He also hold stakes in a variety of multinational oil companies like Shell, Chevron and Exxon Mobil.

text.headline: Trump's Stock Portfolio: Big Oil, Big Banks And More Foreign Connections
text.text: Forbes / Trump's Stock Portfolio: Big Oil, Big Banks And More Foreign Connections
